In case you have loops please name the loop variables more meaningful.

ForLoopNaming.option:
Name	Default Value	Description
allowSimpleLoops	false	Ignore simple loops, that are not nested
cursorPattern	[a-zA-Z_0-9]{5,}	The pattern used for the cursor loop variable
indexPattern	[a-zA-Z_0-9]{5,}	The pattern used for the index loop variable
